thread.section_title: Energymakeovers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energymakeovers | energymakeovers.com.au
thread.title: Derren Sulivian

author: Derren Sulivian
title: Derren Sulivian
text:
We used the Commercial Division to assist in changing all of our Fluro Tubes to LED's. We selected a suitable date and time, and the friendly Electrician turned up spot on time (yes on time!). He then proceeded to work efficiently and without fuss. Performed all the works specified in a timely manner and then left the place clean and tidy.
We are already saving money.
